title: Noragami Aragoto OVA
synopsis: Hiyori Iki goes on a skiing trip with her parents and happens to bump into Yato and Yukine. After a short while, they find the other gods who are there for a company vacation. But amidst all the fun, someone is plotting a heinous crime, and Yato is the primary target.
voices: ['Kamiya, Hiroshi', 'Kaji, Yuki', 'Uchida, Maaya', 'Sawashiro, Miyuki', 'Toyosaki, Aki', 'Fukuyama, Jun', 'Tatsumi, Yuiko', 'Ono, Daisuke', 'Inoue, Kazuhiko', 'Toujou, Hisako']
staff: [['THE ORAL CIGARETTES', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['ryo', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Tia', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Adachitoka', ['Original Creator']]]
